long_description: Step into the NRS Paddle water shoes, wade into your favorite waters and enjoy the experience with warm, protected feet. 3mm neoprene uppers with fleece linings offer excellent insulation especially if you frequently suffer from chilly toes. Gusseted, zippered sides open wide to facilitate foot entry and close tightly around ankle to enhance fit. Padded ankle patches reduce pesky ankle-bone pressure when you're inside a kayak. 5mm neoprene insoles offer cushy comfort when negotiating rocky shorelines. 3mm traction soles wrap around the uppers, adding protection to the sides of your feet and your heels. NRS Paddle water shoes come in whole sizes only; order up to accommodate half sizes. Women should order 1 size smaller than your regular shoe size.
short_description: Step into the NRS Paddle water shoes, wade into your favorite waters and enjoy the experience with warm, protected feet.
